name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description:
Use: Feed the Coagulum, redirecting 20% of all healing done until 1.2 million healing has been consumed. Once sated, the Coagulum bursts to heal 5 allies for 881,018.

Lingering effluvia causes affected allies' next attacks to deal an additional 22,222 Shadow damage, increased based on overhealing done by the Coagulum. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

name_description.display_string: The War Within Season 1 Raid Finder

spells.description: Equip: The Core's unstable energies will randomly buff one of your secondary stats for 1,428. This lasts between 10 and 30 sec before randomly changing to another stat.

spell.description: Use: Reduces your falling speed for 2 min. (3 Min Cooldown)
